data: Bucking Broncho awoke to the familiar cry of “Roll out, roll out, show a leg!” and thinking it was the call of the Round Up Boss in the early morning, he opened his eyes and sat up.
Bucking Broncho awoke to the familiar cry of "Roll out, roll out, show a leg!" and thinking it was the call of the Round Up Boss in the early morning, he opened his eyes and sat up.
